name: Enterprise Architecture CoE
description: An EA Center of Excellence in a large banking organization.

name: Architecture Governance
description: Establish and enforce architecture standards and policies.

name: Technology Assessment
description: Evaluate and recommend technologies aligned with business goals.

name: Roadmap Development
description: Create and maintain a strategic roadmap for architecture initiatives.

name: Stakeholder Engagement
description: Facilitate communication and collaboration among stakeholders.

name: Capability Maturity Assessment
description: Assess and improve the maturity of architectural practices.

name: Policy Development
description: Draft and update architecture policies to ensure compliance.

name: Standards Enforcement
description: Monitor adherence to architecture standards across projects.

name: Risk Assessment
description: Identify and evaluate risks associated with architectural decisions.

name: Compliance Auditing
description: Conduct audits to verify compliance with architecture governance.

name: Training and Awareness
description: Provide training sessions to promote understanding of architecture standards.

name: Technology Scouting
description: Identify emerging technologies that could enhance business operations.

name: Vendor Evaluation
description: Assess and compare technology vendors based on business needs.

name: Technology Alignment
description: Ensure selected technologies align with strategic business objectives.

name: Cost-Benefit Analysis
description: Evaluate the financial implications of adopting new technologies.

name: Implementation Planning
description: Develop actionable plans for integrating new technologies into existing systems.

name: Roadmap Prioritization
description: Identify and prioritize architecture initiatives based on strategic goals.

name: Roadmap Communication
description: Disseminate the strategic roadmap to stakeholders for alignment and awareness.

name: Roadmap Review
description: Regularly assess and update the roadmap to reflect changing business needs.

name: Roadmap Integration
description: Ensure alignment of the roadmap with other enterprise strategies and initiatives.

name: Roadmap Performance Tracking
description: Monitor and evaluate the progress of initiatives outlined in the roadmap.

name: Stakeholder Mapping
description: Identify and categorize stakeholders based on influence and interest.

name: Feedback Collection
description: Gather input and feedback from stakeholders to inform decisions.

name: Collaboration Tools Management
description: Implement and maintain tools that facilitate stakeholder collaboration.

name: Engagement Strategy Development
description: Create strategies to enhance stakeholder engagement and participation.

name: Conflict Resolution
description: Address and resolve conflicts among stakeholders to maintain collaboration.

name: Maturity Evaluation
description: Conduct assessments to determine current maturity levels of architectural practices.

name: Improvement Planning
description: Develop actionable plans to enhance architectural maturity based on assessment findings.

name: Benchmarking
description: Compare architectural practices against industry standards and best practices.

name: Training Development
description: Create training programs to elevate skills and knowledge in architectural practices.

name: Feedback Mechanism
description: Establish processes to gather and incorporate feedback on architectural maturity improvements.
